snippet: "We hired people to do these jobs, why is it that nobody seems competent enough to do them?" the owners wondered.
abstract: "We hired people to do these jobs, why is it that nobody seems competent enough to do them?" the owners wondered.
lead_paragraph: Alexandra Mayzler's delegation skills have vastly improved since we first met. But at the last meeting of our business group, she said she's still too involved with the day-to-day minutiae of running her business, Thinking Caps Tutoring. "I want to move away from all hands on deck to each person has responsibilities," Ms. Mayzler said.

headline.main: Finding a Balance Between Delegating and Micromanaging
